notes.title: Project Planning Meeting Notes
notes.content:
Attended the quarterly project planning meeting today. Key points discussed:

1. Q4 Objectives:
   - Launch new mobile app by December
   - Increase user engagement by 25%
   - Implement new security features

2. Resource Allocation:
   - Frontend team: 3 developers
   - Backend team: 2 developers
   - QA team: 1 tester

3. Timeline:
   - Week 1-2: Design and prototyping
   - Week 3-6: Development phase
   - Week 7-8: Testing and bug fixes
   - Week 9-10: Deployment and launch

Next meeting scheduled for next Friday at 2 PM.
notes.summary: Quarterly project planning meeting covering Q4 objectives, resource allocation, and timeline for mobile app launch.

notes.title: Healthy Recipe Collection
notes.content:
## Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl

**Ingredients:**
- 1 cup quinoa
- 1 cucumber, diced
- 1 cup cherry tomatoes
- 1/2 red onion, sliced
- 1/2 cup kalamata olives
- 1/4 cup feta cheese
- 2 tbsp olive oil
- 1 tbsp lemon juice
- Salt and pepper to taste

**Instructions:**
1. Cook quinoa according to package directions
2. Let cool completely
3. Mix all vegetables in a large bowl
4. Add cooled quinoa
5. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice
6. Season with salt and pepper
7. Top with feta cheese

**Nutritional Info:**
- Calories: 320 per serving
- Protein: 12g
- Fiber: 6g
notes.summary: Collection of healthy Mediterranean recipes with detailed ingredients and nutritional information.

notes.title: Investment Portfolio Review
notes.content:
## Portfolio Performance - October 2025

**Current Holdings:**
- Tech Stocks (40%): AAPL, GOOGL, MSFT, TSLA
- Index Funds (30%): VTI, VXUS
- Bonds (20%): BND, TLT
- Crypto (10%): BTC, ETH

**Performance Summary:**

**Action Items:**
1. Rebalance portfolio to maintain 40/30/20/10 allocation
2. Consider adding REITs for diversification
3. Review bond allocation given current interest rates
4. Set up automatic monthly contributions

**Next Review:** November 15, 2025
notes.summary: Monthly investment portfolio review with performance analysis and rebalancing recommendations.

notes.title: Travel Itinerary - Japan 2025
notes.content:
## 10-Day Japan Adventure

**Day 1-3: Tokyo**
- Arrival at Narita Airport
- Hotel: Park Hyatt Tokyo
- Activities: Senso-ji Temple, Tsukiji Fish Market, Shibuya Crossing
- Restaurants: Sushi Dai, Ramen Nagi

**Day 4-6: Kyoto**
- Bullet train to Kyoto
- Hotel: The Ritz-Carlton Kyoto
- Activities: Fushimi Inari Shrine, Arashiyama Bamboo Grove, Kinkaku-ji
- Restaurants: Kikunoi, Giro Giro Hitoshina

**Day 7-9: Osaka**
- Train to Osaka
- Hotel: Conrad Osaka
- Activities: Osaka Castle, Dotonbori, Universal Studios
- Restaurants: Kani Doraku, Okonomiyaki Chitose

**Day 10: Return**
- Flight from Kansai Airport
- Souvenirs: Matcha tea, traditional crafts

**Budget:** $3,500 per person
**Travel Insurance:** Covered
**Visa:** Not required for US citizens
notes.summary: Detailed 10-day Japan travel itinerary covering Tokyo, Kyoto, and Osaka with accommodations, activities, and dining recommendations.

notes.title: Learning Path - Machine Learning
notes.content:
## ML Learning Journey 2025

**Phase 1: Foundations (Weeks 1-4)**
- Mathematics: Linear Algebra, Calculus, Statistics
- Programming: Python, NumPy, Pandas
- Resources: Khan Academy, Coursera ML Course

**Phase 2: Core Concepts (Weeks 5-8)**
- Supervised Learning: Regression, Classification
- Unsupervised Learning: Clustering, Dimensionality Reduction
- Model Evaluation: Cross-validation, Metrics
- Resources: Scikit-learn documentation, Andrew Ng course

**Phase 3: Deep Learning (Weeks 9-12)**
- Neural Networks: Perceptrons, Backpropagation
- Frameworks: TensorFlow, PyTorch
- Applications: Computer Vision, NLP
- Resources: Deep Learning Specialization, Fast.ai

**Phase 4: Projects (Weeks 13-16)**
- Project 1: Image Classification
- Project 2: Sentiment Analysis
- Project 3: Recommendation System
- Portfolio: GitHub repository

**Goals:**
- Complete 4 projects by end of year
- Contribute to open source ML projects
- Attend 2 ML conferences
notes.summary: Comprehensive 16-week machine learning learning path with phases, resources, and project goals.

notes.title: Home Renovation Checklist
notes.content:
## Kitchen Renovation Project

**Phase 1: Planning & Design**
- [x] Measure kitchen dimensions
- [x] Create 3D design mockup
- [x] Get contractor quotes (3 received)
- [x] Choose materials and finishes
- [ ] Finalize budget ($25,000)
- [ ] Obtain permits

**Phase 2: Demolition**
- [ ] Remove old cabinets
- [ ] Remove old countertops
- [ ] Remove old appliances
- [ ] Dispose of debris
- [ ] Clean and prep space

**Phase 3: Installation**
- [ ] Install new electrical outlets
- [ ] Install new plumbing
- [ ] Install new cabinets
- [ ] Install new countertops
- [ ] Install new appliances
- [ ] Install new flooring

**Phase 4: Finishing**
- [ ] Paint walls
- [ ] Install backsplash
- [ ] Install lighting fixtures
- [ ] Final cleaning
- [ ] Move back in

**Timeline:** 6-8 weeks
**Contractor:** ABC Construction
**Materials:** Home Depot, Lowes
notes.summary: Detailed kitchen renovation checklist with phases, tasks, timeline, and contractor information.

notes.title: Family Reunion Planning
notes.content:
## Annual Family Reunion 2025

**Event Details:**
- Date: July 15, 2025
- Time: 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM
- Location: Central Park, Pavilion #3
- Expected Guests: 45-50 people

**Planning Committee:**
- Coordinator: Mom (Sarah)
- Food: Aunt Mary, Cousin Lisa
- Activities: Uncle John, Sister Emma
- Decorations: Grandma Rose

**Menu Planning:**
- Main Course: BBQ (burgers, hot dogs, chicken)
- Sides: Potato salad, coleslaw, baked beans
- Desserts: Apple pie, chocolate cake, ice cream
- Beverages: Lemonade, iced tea, water, soda
- Special: Vegetarian options for 5 guests

**Activities:**
- 10:00 AM: Welcome and introductions
- 11:00 AM: Family photo session
- 12:00 PM: Lunch and socializing
- 2:00 PM: Games and activities
- 4:00 PM: Family talent show
- 5:00 PM: Cake and closing

**Budget:** $800
**RSVP Deadline:** June 30, 2025
notes.summary: Comprehensive family reunion planning with event details, committee assignments, menu, activities, and budget.

notes.title: Shopping List - Holiday Season
notes.content:
## Holiday Shopping 2025

**Gift List:**
- Mom: Spa gift certificate ($100)
- Dad: New golf clubs ($300)
- Sister: Designer handbag ($250)
- Brother: Gaming console ($400)
- Grandma: Photo album with family pics ($50)
- Grandpa: Fishing gear ($150)
- Niece: Art supplies set ($75)
- Nephew: LEGO set ($80)
- Best Friend: Wine tasting experience ($120)
- Colleague: Gift card ($25)

**Home Decorations:**
- Christmas tree (7ft artificial)
- String lights (LED, warm white)
- Ornaments (glass and plastic mix)
- Wreath for front door
- Stockings (6 pieces)
- Tree skirt
- Candles and candle holders

**Food & Beverages:**
- Turkey (12-14 lbs)
- Ham (8 lbs)
- Stuffing mix
- Cranberry sauce
- Green beans
- Sweet potatoes
- Dinner rolls
- Wine (red and white)
- Eggnog
- Hot chocolate mix

**Total Budget:** $2,000
**Shopping Strategy:**
- Week 1: Online orders (gifts)
- Week 2: Local stores (decorations)
- Week 3: Grocery stores (food)
- Week 4: Last-minute items
notes.summary: Comprehensive holiday shopping list with gifts, decorations, food, and strategic shopping plan.

notes.title: Health & Fitness Goals 2025
notes.content:
## Annual Health & Fitness Plan

**Current Stats:**
- Weight: 180 lbs
- Body Fat: 18%
- BMI: 24.2
- Resting Heart Rate: 65 bpm

**Goals for 2025:**
- Weight: 170 lbs (lose 10 lbs)
- Body Fat: 15%
- Run 5K in under 25 minutes
- Complete 100 push-ups in one set
- Deadlift 225 lbs
- Meditate daily for 10 minutes

**Workout Schedule:**
- Monday: Upper body strength training
- Tuesday: Cardio (running/cycling)
- Wednesday: Lower body strength training
- Thursday: Yoga/Pilates
- Friday: Full body HIIT
- Saturday: Outdoor activities (hiking/biking)
- Sunday: Rest and recovery

**Nutrition Plan:**
- Calorie target: 2,200 per day
- Protein: 150g daily
- Carbs: 200g daily
- Fats: 80g daily
- Water: 3 liters daily
- Supplements: Multivitamin, Omega-3, Protein powder

**Progress Tracking:**
- Weekly weigh-ins
- Monthly body measurements
- Fitness app logging
- Photo progress (monthly)

**Milestones:**
- Q1: Lose 3 lbs, establish routine
- Q2: Lose 3 lbs, improve running time
- Q3: Lose 2 lbs, increase strength
- Q4: Lose 2 lbs, achieve all goals
notes.summary: Comprehensive health and fitness plan with current stats, goals, workout schedule, nutrition plan, and progress tracking.

tasks.title: Visit the hospital
tasks.description: This was the day prepared to see the patients

tasks.title: Complete Q4 Project Proposal
tasks.description: Prepare comprehensive project proposal for Q4 mobile app development including timeline, budget, resource allocation, and risk assessment. Include market research, competitor analysis, and technical specifications.

tasks.title: Schedule Annual Health Checkup
tasks.description: Book annual physical examination with Dr. Smith. Include blood work, cholesterol check, blood pressure monitoring, and discuss any health concerns. Bring list of current medications and supplements.

tasks.title: Renew Car Insurance Policy
tasks.description: Compare insurance quotes from 3 different providers. Current policy expires on December 15th. Consider adding roadside assistance and rental car coverage. Review coverage limits and deductibles.

tasks.title: Plan Thanksgiving Dinner Menu
tasks.description: Create detailed menu for 12 guests including appetizers, main course, sides, desserts, and beverages. Consider dietary restrictions (2 vegetarians, 1 gluten-free). Create shopping list and cooking timeline.

tasks.title: Update LinkedIn Profile
tasks.description: Refresh professional profile with recent achievements, skills, and experience. Add new project portfolio, update headline, and request recommendations from colleagues. Optimize for relevant keywords.

tasks.title: Learn Spanish - Complete Level A2
tasks.description: Finish Duolingo Spanish course Level A2. Practice speaking with native speakers twice a week. Complete 5 lessons per day. Focus on past tense and future tense conjugations.

tasks.title: Organize Home Office Space
tasks.description: Declutter and reorganize home office for better productivity. Install new shelving, cable management system, and ergonomic chair. Set up proper lighting and create filing system for documents.

tasks.title: Prepare Tax Documents
tasks.description: Gather all necessary documents for 2025 tax filing including W-2s, 1099s, receipts for deductions, mortgage statements, and charitable contribution records. Schedule appointment with tax preparer.

tasks.title: Plan Weekend Hiking Trip
tasks.description: Research and plan 2-day hiking trip to Blue Ridge Mountains. Book accommodation, check weather forecast, prepare gear list, and plan meals. Invite 3 friends and coordinate transportation.

tasks.title: Review and Update Emergency Contacts
tasks.description: Update emergency contact information in phone, workplace records, and medical forms. Include family members, close friends, and healthcare providers. Share updated list with family members.
